record.title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Dill Sauce
record.description: Freshly grilled salmon fillet topped with a creamy lemon dill sauce, served with asparagus and roasted potatoes.

record.title: Steak Frites
record.description: 10 oz. New York strip steak cooked to your liking, served with crispy French fries and a side of béarnaise sauce.

record.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
record.description: Fettuccine pasta tossed in a creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken and Parmesan cheese.

record.title: Vegetarian Pad Thai
record.description: Rice noodles stir-fried with tofu, vegetables, peanuts, and a tangy Pad Thai sauce.

record.title: Pork Tenderloin with Apple Chutney
record.description: Seared pork tenderloin served with a sweet and savory apple chutney, accompanied by mashed sweet potatoes.

record.title: Shrimp Scampi
record.description: Shrimp sautéed in garlic butter, white wine, and lemon juice, served over linguine pasta.

record.title: Beef Bourguignon
record.description: Slow-cooked beef stew in red wine with mushrooms, onions, and carrots, served with mashed potatoes.

record.title: Mushroom Risotto
record.description: Creamy risotto with a variety of wild mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and truffle oil.

record.title: Roasted Duck Breast
record.description: Pan-seared duck breast with a cherry sauce, served with wild rice pilaf and green beans.

record.title: Lamb Chops with Rosemary
record.description: Grilled lamb chops marinated in rosemary and garlic, served with roasted vegetables and mint sauce.

record.title: Fish and Chips
record.description: Crispy battered cod served with thick-cut fries and tartar sauce.

record.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
record.description: Spaghetti with a creamy sauce made with eggs, pancetta, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.

record.title: Chicken Pot Pie
record.description: Savory pie filled with chicken, vegetables, and a creamy sauce, topped with a flaky crust.

record.title: Lasagna Bolognese
record.description: Layers of pasta, meat sauce, béchamel sauce, and cheese, baked to perfection.

record.title: Tuna Steak with Avocado Salsa
record.description: Seared tuna steak topped with a fresh avocado salsa, served with quinoa and grilled vegetables.

record.title: Butternut Squash Ravioli
record.description: Homemade ravioli filled with butternut squash and ricotta cheese, served with a sage butter sauce.

record.title: Paella Valenciana
record.description: Traditional Spanish rice dish with saffron, chicken, seafood, and vegetables.

record.title: Moussaka
record.description: Greek baked dish with layers of eggplant, ground meat, and a creamy béchamel sauce.

record.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
record.description: Tender pieces of chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce with Indian spices, served with rice.

record.title: Shepherd's Pie
record.description: Ground meat cooked with vegetables in a rich gravy, topped with mashed potatoes and baked until golden brown.

record.title: Chicken Curry
record.description: Tender pieces of chicken cooked in a spicy tomato-based sauce with Indian spices, served with rice.

record.title: Beef Stew
record.description: Slow-cooked beef stew in red wine with mushrooms, onions, and carrots, served with mashed potatoes.

record.title: Vegetarian Pizza
record.description: Topped with a variety of vegetables and cheese, baked to perfection.

record.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
record.description: Spaghetti with a creamy sauce made with ground beef, tomatoes, and onions.
